Synopsis: Retrieves the public IP address of the current machine using OpenDNS.
Description: This function retrieves the public IP address of the current machine by querying OpenDNS servers. It returns the IP address as a string.
Notes:
Author: Your Name
Date: Current Date

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-MyIpAddress
Retrieves the public IP address of the current machine.
